SEARCH
Package com.instancesobp.instancesReader.legacy

Class ReadConsoleInfo

java.lang.Object
com.instancesobp.instancesReader.legacy.ReadConsoleInfo
public class ReadConsoleInfo extends Object
This class is responsible for reading and managing console input to configure warehouse instances and related parameters. It provides methods to select various settings such as warehouse number, batches, and instance configurations. The class also handles user input validation and ensures that the selected options are valid for the current context.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Gil Borr√°s

    • selectUserWorker

      public static int selectUserWorker(List<UUID> uuidList)
      Prompts the user to select a worker from a list of UUIDs.
      Parameters:
      uuidList - List of UUIDs representing available roles.
      Returns:
      The selected role index.

    • run

      public void run()
      Main method to run the console input process. It guides the user through selecting example types, warehouses, batches, and other configurations.

      public final void selectSettingNumber()
      Prompts the user to select a setting number from the available options in the directory. The method validates the input and ensures the selected setting file exists.

    • selectItemsOrderNumber

      public final void selectItemsOrderNumber()
      Prompts the user to select an order of items number. The method validates the input to ensure it is within the valid range (1-4).

    • selectExampleNumber

      public final void selectExampleNumber()
      Prompts the user to select an example number. The method validates the input to ensure it is within the valid range (1-2).
